description:
In this course you are going to learn about the Oracle XML Publisher which is a template-based publishing solution, it is present with the Oracle E-Business Suite.

It offers us a new method for designing report and then publishing it by integrating Word processing tools that are present inside the E-Business Suite data reporting.

This course includes:

  • XML Publisher
  • Classic Reporting Paradigm
  • XML Publisher Reporting Paradigm
  • Practical demonstration on creating XML Report
  • RTF Template
  • Practical demonstration on creating RTF Template
  • Template Manager
  • Creating the Template
  • Practical demonstration on using template manager
title: Oracle XML Publisher for Developers - Essentials
